headline: SkyWire™ Technology From Microchip Makes It Easier to Align and Compare Clocks Within Nanoseconds Across Geographic Locations
summary: To protect critical infrastructure systems, SkyWire™ technology enables highly scalable and precise time traceability to metrology labsCHANDLER, Ariz., Oct. 15, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Network clocks are the backbone of critical infrastructure operations, with the precise alignment of clocks becoming increasingly important for data centers, power utilities, wireless and wireline networks and financial institutions. headline: How New U.S. Chip Production Demands May Impact Microchip Technology’s Current Valuation
summary: If you own, follow, or are just now considering Microchip Technology, you might be asking yourself the very question swirling around the market right now: “Should I stick with this stock or is there a better opportunity elsewhere?” That’s a fair point, especially when you see how the numbers stack up. After a choppy twelve months, with the stock down -11.6% over the past year, Microchip has actually shown resilience in 2024, climbing 13.6% year-to-date. Shorter term, the past week and month...
